name: Sonarr
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q sonarr && echo active || echo inactive; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active sonarr || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null; then docker start sonarr || true; elif command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart sonarr || true; fi
